body.name: PURA D'OR Hair Thinning Therapy Biotin Shampoo VANILLA LAVENDER Scent (16 oz) w/Argan Oil, Herbal DHT Blockers, Zero Sulfates, Natural Ingredients For Men & Women, All Hair Types (Packaging may vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 2 mins
features: ACHIEVE A HEALTHY, NOURISHED HAIR: It all starts with a healthy scalp. This invigorating blend of natural extracts and essential nutrients rejuvenates hair by balancing and locking in natural moisture for a silkier, softer, smoother hair from roots to tips.
REDUCES HAIR THINNING: Stimulating blend of Niacin, Biotin, Argan Oil, antioxidants and other natural ingredients detoxify the scalp and encourage healthy hair, strength, and resiliency.

GENTLE YET EFFECTIVE: Developed in a gentle formulation to effectively target leading sources of most common thinning hair-related issues. It can be safely used on color-treated hair without stripping the color out of your hair.

SCIENCE PLUS NATURE. All PURA D’OR formulas combine science and nature to deliver transformative hair therapy. Select Natural Ingredients. No SLS (Sulfates). No Parabens. No Harmful Chemicals. Gluten-Free. Hypo-Allergenic. Cruelty-Free. Manufactured in the USA. Color Safe. Vegan.

100% 365 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We Aim To Offer The Highest Quality On The Market. We guarantee your satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please return it for a FULL REFUND within 365 days.
body.description: PURA D’OR Hair Thinning Therapy Shampoo is a clinically tested formula proven to help strengthen, minimize breakage and reduce hair thinning.* This exclusive blend of key active ingredients helps to improve volume, thickness, shine, split ends and a healthy looking scalp. Niacin, Biotin, Argan Oil, and other natural ingredients help to invigorate and purify the scalp, while encouraging strand strength and resiliency. Free from harsh chemicals, environmentally responsible, hypo-allergenic, vegan, and cruelty free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About PURA D'OR PURA D’OR is driven by desire to provide the best solutions to your toughest beauty and personal care problems. Experience nature and purity in every formula with the combination of select natural ingredients, premium oils, and our naturally-based preservative system. Manufactured in sunny Southern California, PURA D’OR is dedicated in providing sustainable and friendly products that uses renewable energy and recyclable packaging. PURA D'OR Hair Thinning Therapy Shampoo Formerly known as Hair Loss Prevention PURA D'OR Hair Thinning Therapy Shampoo is our original "Hair Loss Prevention Shampoo" that started it all. We took the exact same formula of our previously titled shampoo and put it through a clinical study. The new label now highlights all the many other positive aspects of this great formula. The results were increased thickness, strength and volume, while reducing hair thinning and breakage*. Imbued with 15 DHT herbal extracts and essential oils to create healthier, thicker looking hair.

PURA D'OR Hair Thinning Therapy System was clinically tested in an 8 week study* Reduces Hair Thinning Less Hair in Drain After 8 weeks of daily use, users show significantly less hair in brush, thicker and healthier hair* *Decreases thinning and promotes thickness by reducing breakage. Based on (1) repeated brushing test analyzing breakage after using PURA D'OR shampoo (and conditioner) compared to using shampoo alone and (2) users' self-evaluation of hair thickness, strength and reduced breakage compared to baseline after 8 weeks of using the PURA D'OR SYSTEM.

Benefits of Our Ingredients DHT Blockers The combination 15 Active DHT Blockers including He Shou Wu, Nettle Extracts and Saw Palmetto create healthier, thicker looking hair. Exotic Herbs and Extracts Cedarwood, Clary Sage, Hibiscus, Black Cumin Seed Oil, Tea Tree and Other natural oils and extracts help strengthen hair from root to tip. Argan Oil Argan Oil heals damage hair and protect it from heat and stripping out.

Maximum Defense Anti-Hair Thinning Hair Thinning Therapy Gold Label Anti-Hair Thinning Advanced Therapy Professional Grade Biotin 2X Concentrated Benefits Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness and helps reduce scalp irritation Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness Reduces Hair Thinning, increases thickness # of Key Herbal Active Ingredients 19 15 17 17 17 Actives Concentration 1x 1x 1x 1.5x 2x Preservative system Natural, plant based Natural, plant based Natural, plant based Natural, plant based Natural, plant based Keto Yes No No No No USDA Bio-based ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the brand, quality and scent
reviews.reviewText: My title leads the way. Ive been using this brand for many years and see it as a very good product. My hair is thinning at 55 and this product helps it look fuller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair loves it!
reviews.reviewText: It absolutely brings shine to my hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I thought this would smell better than the original because it was labeled as lavender and vanilla. Don't be fooled. It has a strong medicinal smell. Don't get me wrong....it works. I just wish they could make it smell better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I've waited to write this review after using this shampoo as directed for about 2 1/2 months. At the beginning of Nov. I began losing large amounts of hair due to a massive hormone imbalance. We're talking like a ping pong ball sized wad of hair every time I showered. My hair was visibly getting thin at my temples & hairline & I proceeded to freak out-so I bought this shampoo. My husband had been using Bosley's shampo & cond., but the ingredient list is massive (full of chemicals). I wanted something more natural w/better ingredients, which is why I chose Purad'or. I bought the lavender vanilla scent, which honestly has next to no smell at all (but that's ok). It is very mild smelling w/no chemical smell at all. It's a pinkish gel consistency-not very thick, but not super watery either. 1 pump definitely gets your whole head. It DOES lather up some, but not like the typical soap shampoos. Here's the deal though: YOU MUST LEAVE IT ON FOR 2 MIN. before rinsing out. Now, I'm very impatient, so it's annoying to do, but I just count & do some squats in the shower (might as well get some exercise in, right)? If you don't leave it on 2 min., I notice my hair was more tangly. When I leave it on for the full 2 min., when I rinse, my hair is much more soft & detangled. It has not dried out my hair or my scalp at all. No irritation to the scalp at all (& I have very sensitive skin). I use my own preferred conditioner because I have color treated hair. NOTE: it will strip your color out some-so beware of that, esp. if you use semi-permanent hairdye like me). NOTE: YOU WILL NOT SEE A DIFFERENCE UNTIL YOU'VE USED IT AS DIRECTED FOR A MONTH. At week 2, I saw no difference at all & was getting really discouraged. Then after week 3 I started noticing less fall out & now at 6 weeks, I'm losing way less hair each washing. It went from a big wad of hair to maybe the size of a pea. I waited to review until it was this way consistently & I can honestly say, I have lost this small amount of hair for over a week now. I'm now losing about the same amount I was before all of my hormone issues. It does make your hair seem thicker as well, which also helps. I have never tried the gold label one, so I don't know about the smell of that one, but this blue bottle one that's lavender vanilla has no gross chemical or woodsy smell like some have mentioned on here. It just smells very mildly flowery, but the scent disappears quickly. I will continue to use it, maybe forever, because it's helping me lose less hair. I also take hair vitamins & use a growth scalp oil daily now too, so there's also that. I highly recommend this shampoo though if your hair is thinning & you want a more natural approach without a million chemicals in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Feels like it's working.
reviews.reviewText: Just got the shampoo recently to soon to tell if it's working but sure feels like it's doing something when I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Some very early success and results!! Best product used so far!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 3rd of these products that I have tried. I am not paid to do this. I had a need and ordered this stuff after reading other reviews. They can be hard to sift through as some are paid or given free product to test it. I really wish amazon did not allow this or at least would pass them off as shill reviews.On that note, I have tried Regenepure and Monat products for the same reason. Thinning hair. I am mid 40s and my dad an older brother lost most of their hair much earlier. I still have quite a bit, but it is starting to thin and I feel much too young to let it go. I am considering surgery if needed in the future, but will try anything to put this off or eliminate the need if possible.I did not get much if any success from the other (Regenepure and Monat) products. A lot of hope and wishful thinking, but after a couple of years of using them, my hair was slowly getting worse. I have used this PURA D'OR for about a month. I am also taking PriaPlex (or PriaPlus, bought on Amazon too) pills. I have not been taking the Pria Product for a month yet. I am not sure which is helping, but i have noticed two things. One, my hair is not falling out when i wash it. I used to have 10-20 strands in my hands when I would shower or style with product. Now it is 0-4. The other things I have seen is small hairs coming in on the front hairline. One could argue that these have broken and are regrowth. I am just glad to see little hairs popping out and did not see this before. I am hopeful this is happening all over my scalp. If my hair would thicken by 10-20% this would likely solve my problem for now.I am hopeful that between these two products I can kick the surgery can down the street for 10 years or so. Would definitely recommend both of these products if you have about $90-100 per month to sink into a solution (the pills are about $75/month). If you only have $20 or so to invest a month, start with THIS SHAMPOO. I know it is what is contributing to my early success. I bet I get 3 months or more out of the bottle. I have used for a month and i am not even close to finishing it. I am certain it is more than 1/2 full. I use two pumps each time I shower and not much comes out. My hair is pretty short, and this does cause it to lather pretty well. If you had long-ass thick hair I bet this would go for at least a month. So it does a good job of cleaning hair too. It is not the best smelling shampoo, but i would put baby puke in my hair if it would make it grow. That said, no need to follow up with another shampoo to make it smell better. Just a different smell. Earthy maybe, but you could expect that from a natural product mix.This is the best i have tried to-date on my 2+ year search.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This did help my hair from falling out but I'm not sure about how it helps to regrow hair. I have noticed since using the product that I'm not getting as much hair fall-out as I was before. The only thing I don't like about the product is the smell. It's not horrible but it's not great either. It smells like I'm washing my hair with a pine product but it's not so horrible that I cannot use it. I just wish the company could make it smell more appealing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the ingredients.
reviews.reviewText: I was having issues with my hair falling out and breakage. I was skeptical but thought I would try it. Well, it works! I am now on my second bottle. I do not have dry hair and only use the shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by telling you my hair type, it’s fine thinning , partly due to hereditary and early menopause, it has to be washed every day , else looks very limp and greasy looking , I’ve used many shampoos even baby shampoo ,this shampoo is good value for money , good sized bottle ,I’ve followed the instructions, and agree with some other reviews two minutes seems long time to wait , but I massage it into my scalp lather it up and put towel on head , go make coffee or load up washer ,then go back and rinse it out , the amount I use is one push down on pump , that’s more than enough , the smell well not like what it says on bottle , but it’s ok , the results , I’ve not visually saw any change , but it’s only been few weeks , I’ve notice that I can skip a day washing it , it’s still looks like first wash, which I’m impressed by , I not waiting for a miracle , but happy with the result so far , I would recommend this shampoo , I will add to review of any more changes arise but for now , add one to your basket and give it a go .
Muy buen producto, fortalece y disminuye la caída de cabello

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you expect. Great product!
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this product for years Now and it really shows!! The best part of it that its organic but it still has a nice scent!

reviews.reviewTitle: Puar d'or hair loss prevention therapy shampoo is really best shampoo I ever used.
reviews.reviewText: Puar d'or hair loss prevention therapy shampoo is really best shampoo I ever used.It's quality is very excellent and soothing fragrance. When I first ordered it from Amazon 2 years before , i never searched any other shampoo till now . I repeatedly ordered the same .Thank you Amazon .

reviews.reviewTitle: A good sulphate free shampoo for day to day use, but did not do it for me on hair growth
reviews.reviewText: Bought it firstly because it is sulphate free & am looking for shampoos for hair growth. Used for 7-8 months daily. Washes very well, even for oily hair.Smells pleasant and gives my hair a little more volume and texture through out the day, just did not notice any hair growth. Did notice less hair fall though.
